title: Is We Dumb? | Lonesome Larry. Epoxy. Trash. Celebratory Gunfire.
description:
Have you ever been about to have intercourse and sadly realized you don't have a condom? Of course, who hasn't... BUT... did you then proceed to EPOXY YOUR PEE HOLE SHUT?! Let's talk about that, getting super mad about velcro strips, skeet shooting with energy drinks, living in a house made of legos, and more and today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/Q5F_5OAWVGA
